mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (email, password, name, tel) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{tel})
mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password, name, tel, isMembership, createdAt, updatedAt FROM USER WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, email, password, name, tel, isMembership, createdAt, updatedAt FROM USER WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
